reviewText:
I bought this DVD to get a copy of Country. No other actress then or since can match the emotional performances of Ms. Lange. There is that scene in Country that makes you want to rise up and take arms with Ms Lange, or at least stand up and cheer.

A Thousand Acres was a disappointment when I saw it in the theater.  However, the cast is magnificent. It is worth watching just to see these wonderful actors at work.

I remember Paradise as pleasant from a previous viewing, but have not re-watched it at this time.

I purchased this specifically to get the movie PARADISE with Melanie Griffith and Don Johnson.  This is one the most beautiful, moving, heartfelt, well written and directed movies I have ever seen.  The performances of both Griffith, Johnson and a young Elijah Wood are so outstanding that I can't understand why this movie didn't win a ton awards for everyone involved.  The location of this movie is also perfect.  I became an instant fan of both Griffith (see MILK MONEY, WORKING GIRL, SOMETHING WILD, CRAZY IN ALABAMA and more) and Johnson - (see THE HOT SPOT and GUILTY AS SIN and more).  Getting Jessica Lange on the other 2 movies in this  pack is a  bonus as she is also a wonderful actress.
surprised these are all pretty good films.  a big bargin.
No subtitles.
Satisfactory purchase ... arrived in timely manner in condition described.  We are  happy.

Good DVD. All 3 movies were great. Loved them.

Three superb movies at an amazing low price!  I bought this set for "Country", a film I admired very much when it was released and never forgot.  Other reviewers panned the two movies packaged with it and I was expecting very little from them, but,  "A Thousand  Acres" is superb and "Paradise" is a very moving film.  I have purchased many movies from Amazon but this 3 pack is the best value of all.  I had never heard of "A Thousand Acres", but after viewing it multiple times I find the movie and performances of the cast mesmerizing.  Michelle Pfieffer and Jessica Lange are phenomenal in their roles and the rest of the cast merely superb.  A great, believable story that actually has an epic quality to it.  You will get an emotional workout watching it, so be forewarned.  It ended up eclipsing to a degree "Country" the movie I bought the set for.  "Paradise" is also very good; very involving and touching with great performances by the leads and a very powerful performance from the two youngsters whose chemistry together reminded me of the performances of the two great child actors in another favorite movie of mine, "The Secret Garden"  I highly recommend this set to fans of excellent movies, and a true bargain to boot.
Everything came timely and item was just as expected :)

This film, A Thousand Acres, and acting,  has been terribly under-rated. Jessica Lange's acting out of denial and ultimate ownership are superb.  The expressions on her face are realistic and  heart wrenching as well as the playing out of her sister's rage and cancer.  Perhaps the world just wasn't ready. This film should run again.
